original_title: Lake Of Tears: By the Black Sea
overview: Music DVD by Swedish Progressive/Doom/Gothic Metal Lake Of Tears, released in 2014. Includes the recordings of a full concert with 16 songs (Bucharest 2013). Bonus material on the DVD is a “Making Of”, an interview and the band’s latest video clips „Illwill“ and „House Of The Setting Sun“.
title: Lake Of Tears: By the Black Sea
